question: You came to know about a piece of equipment that would help you at your workplace. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing to share my learning experience on a new tablet provided by the company. Mr. Chon handed it to me last Friday, and I have been using the equipment to see how it would work when we sell the insurance services. Among other tablets, it has by far the largest 15inch AMOLED display along with an attachable keyboard.

Thus, I believe that this unusual tablet would be beneficial to us in several ways. First, it would be greatly useful when we consult potential clients while we try to explain new insurance products, using considerably bigger display as if we were using a projector in a meeting room. Furthermore, it would be at least two times faster to submit a report after meetings outside due to the optional keyboard.

Luckily, one of my friends is working in the tablet company, and he is offering an exclusive B2B price for us. If you consider purchasing this item, please let me know. I would be more than happy to help you.

error_list.error_des: The abbreviated title Mr. seems to be punctuated incorrectly. Consider changing the punctuation.
The noun phrase considerably bigger display seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
